greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations p of [n] such that |p(i) - p(i-1)| is in {2,5} for all i from 2 to n.
comment: For n>1, a(n)/2 is the number of Hamiltonian paths on the graph with vertex set {1,...,n} where i is adjacent to j iff |i-j| is in {2,5}.
maple: b:= proc(s, l) option remember; `if`(s={}, 1, add(
a:= proc(n) option remember; if n=0 then 1 else
